com.acrolinx.javasdk.api.storage

Interface ApplicationStore

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    EclipseStore

    public interface ApplicationStore
    The ApplicationStore is used to store at least the authentication token and the time of last BroadcastMessage retrieval. It could be used to store ConnectionSettings also. It could be also used for adapting existing host application stores. See AcrolinxFactory.applicationStores() for creation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ApplicationStore NULL
      The null ApplicationStore does not store and loads nothing.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String loadProperty(String propertyName)
      Load property as string should load the expected property as string.
      void storeProperty(String propertyName, String value)
      Stores a property in the store.

    • Field Detail

      • NULL

        static final ApplicationStore NULL
        The null ApplicationStore does not store and loads nothing.

    • Method Detail

      • loadProperty

        String loadProperty(String propertyName)
        Load property as string should load the expected property as string. If the string not exists or is currently unavailable return null. the returned value will be converted by other methods to correct type.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the property name
        Returns:
        the string or null

      • storeProperty

        void storeProperty(String propertyName,
                 String value)
        Stores a property in the store.
        Parameters:
        propertyName - the name / key of the property
        value - the value of the property
